duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and direct operations for world-class integrated supply chain projects, assessing project issues and developing enhanced resolutions to meet productivity, quality, and customer satisfaction goals.
Collaborate with ISC functions, sites, and leadership to build relationships, understand productivity inhibitors, and develop solutions to address these issues.
Manage activities to support the data load process, current analytics projects, and dashboards with team members.
Lead projects technically, improve the skill sets of team members, and advance the analytical capabilities of each ISC function.
Develop and enable delivery mechanisms for actionable analytics that identify improvement opportunities for all ISC functions.
Standardize and document processes across all projects, including monthly connect, newsletter, focus training for users, and functional training for team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Business (Master’s preferred)
